We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private RateOfChange _roc;
// In Initialize()
_roc = ROC(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_roc.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "ROC Is Ready", _roc.IsReady);
    Plot("My Indicators", "ROC Warm Up Period", _roc.WarmUpPeriod);
    Plot("My Indicators", "ROC Period", _roc.Period);
    Plot("My Indicators", "ROC Current", _roc.Current);
    Plot("My Indicators", "ROC Name", _roc.Name);
    Plot("My Indicators", "ROC Samples", _roc.Samples);
}
# In Initialize()
self.roc = self.ROC(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.roc.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "ROC Is Ready", self.roc.IsReady);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "ROC Warm Up Period", self.roc.WarmUpPeriod);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "ROC Period", self.roc.Period);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "ROC Current", self.roc.Current);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "ROC Name", self.roc.Name);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "ROC Samples", self.roc.Samples);
}
